meanings.sent1: I had to unkink the garden hose before watering the plants.
meanings.sent2: She carefully unkinked the wire hanger to use it for hanging clothes.
meanings.sent3: Trying to unkink a slinky toy can be quite a challenge!
meanings.sent4: Her gentle touch seemed to unkink the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The yoga instructor taught us how to unkink our muscles after a long day.

meanings.sent1: He used a comb to unkink the knots in his hair.
meanings.sent2: The tailor had to unkink the fabric before sewing it into a dress.
meanings.sent3: It's always satisfying to unkink a tangled necklace.
meanings.sent4: The therapist helped her unkink the emotional knots she had been carrying.
meanings.sent5: The magician seemed to unkink the tangled ropes with a flick of his wrist.
